Package org.example.lab.agh.model_package

Class Room

java.lang.Object
org.example.lab.agh.model_package.Room
public class Room extends Object
Represents a hotel room with attributes such as room number, price per night, maximum guest capacity, and registered guests.

  • Constructor Summary

      public Room(int roomNumber, double price, int maxGuestNumber)
      Constructs a Room with specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      roomNumber - the unique room number
      price - the price per night for the room
      maxGuestNumber - the maximum number of guests allowed in the room
